full_title: Shake That Devil by Antony and the Johnsons
title: Shake That Devil

3 ContributorsShake That Devil LyricsThat dog had his way with me

So that everyone can see

That bird, that bird

That pig, that pig

Shake that pig right out of me
That pig, that pig
